text: Toot & Puddle is an animated children's television series based on the book series of the same name by author Holly Hobbie. Produced by Mercury Filmworks in association with National Geographic Kids, the series features Joanne Vannicola and Samantha Reynolds as the title characters. It premiered on Treehouse TV in Canada on September 2, 2008 and last aired there on July 31, 2011. In the US, it first aired on Noggin (now Nick Jr.) on November 16, 2008 and ended on May 15, 2011 with reruns following until November 30, 2012. 26 episodes (52 segments) were produced. title: Toot & Puddle (TV series)
